channel.title: Help with shops on freescape
channel.description:
I need help with this, Like i said on my last post, when i trade Horvic, it dces me... Here it is:
else if (NPCID == 549) { // Horvic PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43;
spawn = 549 2819 3353 0 0 0 0 0 2 Horvic
shop = 43 Smithing Shop 2 2 2349 1000 2351 1000 2353 1000 2355 1000 2357 1000 2359 1000 2361 1000 2363 1000 2365 1000 2347 10
If someone would help me out? [img]http://i211.photobucket.com/albums/bb304/Rich_Dude_2007/co-owner.png[/img]Revolation,[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 12:57:47 PM[/size][hr]Someone, Could help me out...

item.title: Help with shops on freescape
item.dc:creator: @flipmc flipmc
item.description:
@flipmc wrote:

[quote=“flipmc”]Open up, “autospawn.cfg”:
{Example}

//–Start Of Shops
spawn = 522 2792 3175 0 3480 9490 3890 9500 2 Stuff_Shop
[hr]
Open up, “shops.cfg”:
{Example}
shop = 1 @red@Stuff_Shop 1 1 4151 10 1215 10 1231 10 1305 10 1377 10 1434 10 1704 10 4587 10 5698 10 3105 10 1333 10 1052 10 6568 10 3486 10 3483 10 3481 10 1127 20 1093 20 1079 20 1163 20 892 500 4212 10 4214 10 2581 5 2577 5 861 10 859 10 3842 10 3840 10 3844 10 2552 50 1712 50
{Abit messy, sorry :P}
[hr]
Open up, “npchandler.java”:
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 522) {
if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Sellin Stuff !”;
{If that doesn’t work, well I’m sorry. You have to go to the Tutorial List, and find it yourself.}
[hr]
[size=8pt]Owner Of:[/size] [size=8pt]AbandonedScape[/size]
[size=8pt]Credits:[/size] [size=8pt]Flip & LeScape PK[/size]
[size=8pt]Progess: [ [size=8pt]|[/size][size=8pt]|||||||||[/size] ][/quote]

Read full topic
